name: KID necklace
description: This gorgeous 3/4 inch round sterling silver charm features the logo of one of my favorite charities on 3 feet of adjustable diamond ball chain. Kids In Distress - 'KID' - is a community-supported agency providing services for the prevention and treatment of child abuse in South Florida. 100% of the proceeds from this necklace goes directly to the charity! For more information visit www.kidsindistress.org

name: Migration Clutch
description: Clutch-style bronze handbag with blackened sterling connecting to 18k rose gold ring. Purple python leather shown thru butterfly cutouts and black diamond at closure. The perfect red carpet gem!

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Stingray Frame Ring, Two Finger RAM329R
description: Sterling silver 2" stingray frame now available with a double ring! Brand new ring just added because everyone needs a little more color in their life! Available in sizes 6&7, 7&8, 8&9.

name: Stingray Belt Buckle, RAN101
description: Using the riveting process to frame exotic skins in metal, this limited edition collection - limited to 10, numbered and signed - gives the ultimate in customization. All belts are made with hand sawed sterling silver with copper backing, stingray leather shown at buckle through cutout, with Italian leather belt straps. All styles come in any color combination of more than 15 stingray and 5 belt colors. Belt shown in first image with Denim stingray and Caramel belt, 1.5 x 3.5 inches.  Choose "custom" in the drop down menu to order this style with different stingray & belt colors or size.

name: Cuttlefish Series Cufflinks, RAN310C
description: Texture cuff links- made by the ancient process of cuttlefish casting. Each side has a different texture, both are shown. Available in darkened and bright silver. Also available in gold, please contact Ruth Avra for pricing.

name: Anchor Chains, 36" + 15"
description: This is Ruth Avra's spin on the classic anchor chain. Blackened sterling silver with one 18k gold link at the clasp (so finding that hidden clasp is easy), these simple necklaces are an everyday favorite! Available in two lengths, 15 inches for $435 retail and 36 inches for $815 retail. Matching earrings available, contact Ruth Avra to order earrings.

name: Letterpress Charm Necklace
description: This adorable sterling silver charm came from an actual letterpress block! A special little treat on this 18 inch sterling silver chain - with signature Ruth Avra clasp, of course - is the genuine rough cut black diamond beads! "&" charm is for sale in this listing, but feel free to custom order any letterpress block you want! Choose a letter that suits you best, the "?" or even the "$" to be the envy of all your friends! Charms are 5/8 inch tall and are from original letterpress blocks, so they are all backwards.

name: Lobster Claw, RAA501
description: This solid silver "charm" is from an actual lobster claw that was eaten during a fabulous family gathering in the summer of 2010! With a sterling silver hoop on fully adjustable silk cord, this truly unique piece makes quite the statement! Also available in bronze for $125, choose your preference from the drop down menu!

name: Crystal Rock Ring
description: Sterling silver sets this one-of-a-kind stunning rock, the only ring you’ll ever need! Well, for one hand at least! Stone is 2.25 x 1 inch, size 6.5

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Twiggy Series Earrings, RAM951E
description: Sterling silver cast twigs, actual twigs found by Ruth in her neighborhood, molded and cast into solid silver. Twigs in earrings are two inches long. Also available in gold with diamonds, 18k rose gold with chocolate diamonds shown, contact Ruth Avra for special order.

name: Agate Chain Necklaces
description: Handmade sterling silver chain necklaces with amazing agates! Available in several different types of stones, contact Ruth Avra for additional images. Limited edition. Necklaces shown in pictures is actual necklace available for purchase, choose from black agate, purple agate or custom from the drop down menu!

name: Boho Series, RAA201
description: Sterling silver handmade chain with carved bone and African beads. Circle is 1.75 inches, abstract sterling leaf is 2.25 inches, all on fully adjustable silk cord. Beads/stones may vary depending on availability. Necklace shown in image is actual necklace available.

name: Boho Series, RAA202
description: Sterling silver handmade chain with carved bone feather, African beads and fossilized agate on fully adjustable silk cord. Chain is 8 inches long. Beads/stones may vary depending on availability. Picture show actual available necklace.

name: Boho Series, RAA203
description: Sterling silver chains with carved bone feather, reclaimed antler bead and fossilized coral beads on fully adjustable silk cord. Chains are 11 and 12.5 inches long. Beads/stones may vary depending on availability.

name: Boho Series, RAA204
description: Sterling silver chains with carved bone, African beads, and reclaimed antler on fully adjustable silk cord. Silver chains are 7 and 8.5 inches with an 8 and 9 inch drop. Beads/stones may vary depending on availability.

name: Antler Rings, RAA601
description: These stunning two finger rings feature naturally shed antler slices set in sterling silver. Each antler piece is unique and special. Picture 1 shows antler slice 2 1/2 x 7/8 inches (at widest) and is sizes 6 & 7. Picture 2 shows antler slice 2 1/8 x 3/4 inches (at widest) and is sizes 6 & 7. Each ring is pictured with the back of the other, both have heart cutout on back. Both rings are SOLD. To purchase a similar ring choose "custom" from the drop down menu and Ruth Avra can send you a variety of antler slices to choose from.

name: Lobster Claw Ring, RAA502
description: This slightly blackened solid sterling silver ring is from the top of an actual lobster claw that was eaten during a fabulous family gathering in the summer of 2010! Available in all sizes.

name: Lobster Claw Earrings, RAA510E
description: Sterling silver lobster claw "top" is from an actual lobster claw that was eaten during a fabulous family gathering in the summer of 2010!

name: Shore Series Necklace, RAM981
description: In her travels, Ruth has founds some amazing items washed up on the beach. These gorgeous examples of nature are molded and cast in solid sterling silver for all to enjoy. All pendants are on a 24” adjustable chain, shells approximately 1.5-2 inches wide. These necklaces are also available in gold. Please contact Ruth Avra for pricing.

name: Shore Series Necklace, RAM982
description: In her travels, Ruth has founds some amazing items washed up on the beach. These gorgeous examples of nature are molded and cast in solid sterling silver for all to enjoy. name: Twiggy Series Bangle with diamond, RAM955D
description: Solid sterling silver (blackened with highlight) twig bangle bracelet with .1carat black diamond. Also available with colorless diamond, and in gold. Please contact Ruth Avra for pricing.

name: Twiggy Series Bangle, RAM955
description: Sterling silver cast twigs, found in the Santa Fe mountains. This bangle is also available with a black diamond; RAM955D for $399 retail.

name: Petal Series, RAM800
description: This gorgeous sterling silver necklace features a handmade petal on 3 feet of diamond cut ball chain. So simple and beautiful it is the perfect everyday favorite! Wear it long, double it, or cut the chain to any length!

name: Petal Series Necklace, RAM804L
description: These sterling silver pieces are modeled after tulip petals. They are always handmade by Ruth Avra in her South Florida studio. Necklaces can be made with any combination of petal sizes. They come graduated unless ordered with specific sizes. This necklace is four graduated petals on a 20" lariat-style chain.

name: Petal Series Necklace, RAM807
description: These sterling silver pieces are modeled after tulip petals. They are always handmade by Ruth Avra in her South Florida studio. Necklaces can be made with any combination of petal sizes. They come graduated unless ordered with specific sizes. Also available in gold, please contact Ruth Avra for pricing.

description: These sterling silver pieces are modeled after tulip petals. They are always handmade by Ruth Avra in her South Florida studio. Necklaces can be made with any combination of petal sizes. description: These sterling silver pieces are modeled after tulip petals. They are always handmade by Ruth Avra in her South Florida studio. Earrings can be made with any combination of petal sizes. These are the smallest petal.

description: These sterling silver pieces are modeled after tulip petals. They are always handmade by Ruth Avra in her South Florida studio. Earrings can be made with any combination of petal sizes. They come graduated unless ordered with specific sizes.

name: Butterfly Series Earrings, RAM850E
description: This series of sterling silver jewelry comes from a butterfly motif seen in many pieces Ruth Avra creates. Earrings also are available with in gold, contact Ruth Avra for pricing.

name: Butterfly Series Necklaces, RAM850
description: This series of jewelry comes from a butterfly motif seen in many pieces Ruth Avra creates. Done in a variety of styles, all of which are available with all - or some - gold butterflies, please contact Ruth Avra for pricing. This necklace is 16" long with Ruth Avra signature clasp.

name: Butterfly Series Necklaces, RAM851
description: This series of jewelry comes from a butterfly motif seen in many pieces Ruth Avra creates. Made of all sterling silver, the background and chain and darkened to let the butterfly become the center of attention. Done in a variety of styles, all of which are available with gold butterflies, please contact Ruth Avra for pricing. Necklace is 16" long.

name: Butterfly Series Necklaces, RAM854
description: This series of jewelry comes from a butterfly motif seen in many pieces Ruth Avra creates. Made of all sterling silver, the background and chain and darkened to let the butterfly become the center of attention. Done in a variety of styles, all of which are available with gold butterflies, please contact Ruth Avra for pricing. Necklace is 18" long.

name: Butterfly Series Necklaces, RAM856
description: This series of jewelry comes from a butterfly motif seen in many pieces Ruth Avra creates. Made of all sterling silver, the background and chain and darkened to let the butterfly become the center of attention. Done in a variety of styles, all of which are available with gold butterflies, please contact Ruth Avra for pricing. Necklace is 18" long.

name: Black Rose Rings, RAM931-2R
description: These Black Rose Rings features a tiny "black rose". All solid sterling silver, this series is blackened. Also available with gold roses, please contact Ruth Avra for pricing.

options.name: custom - choose your size and style

name: Black Rose Earrings, RAM931E
description: The Black Rose Series features a tiny "black rose". Blackened sterling silver rosebud earrings, approximately 1 inch drop from ear wire.

name: Black Rose Series, RAM931L
description: Blackened sterling silver rosebud lariat 20 inch necklace, single rosebud in 1.75 inch tall frame. Signature Ruth Avra clasp fits anywhere for lariat-style necklace. Also available with 18k gold rose bud, available by choosing from the drop down menu below.

name: Black Rose Series, RAM932
description: The Black Rose Series features a tiny "black rose" framed and showcased on an 18 inch chain. Blackened sterling silver rosebud necklaces, two rosebuds in a 1.75 tall frame on 18 inch chain, Ruth Avra signature clasp in back.

name: Black Rose Series, RAM933
description: The Black Rose Series features a tiny "black rose" framed and showcased on an 18 inch chain. Blackened sterling silver rosebud necklace, three rosebuds in 1.75 inch square frame on 18 inch chain, Ruth Avra signature clasp in back.

name: Black Rose Series, RAM937
description: The Black Rose Series features a tiny "black rose" framed and showcased on an 18 inch chain. Blackened sterling silver rosebud necklaces featuring seven rosebuds in 1.75 inch square frame on 18 inch chain, Ruth Avra signature clasp in back.

name: Cutout Series Necklaces, RAN601-5
description: Hand cut sterling silver rivet pendants, available on adjustable leather. Five different styles to choose from. Each design is also available as cuff links in any design - minus the rivet hole. Also available in gold, please contact Ruth Avra for pricing.

name: Cutout Series, RAN602C
description: Sterling silver hand cut pendants (RAN601-5) made into cuff links, minus the rivet hole. Available in five different styles, same styles as pendants. Cuff links shown in picture are actual item available for purchase.

name: Stingray Frame Necklaces
description: Sterling silver genuine stingray frame necklaces, available with 15 different stingray colors, on ball chain (diamond cut for women, regular for men). RAN381 is 1 x 3/4 inches shown with "mauve" stingray diamond ball chain. RAN382 is 2 x 3/4 inches shown with "charcoal" stingray on diamond ball chain. Leather available in black, brown and tan. Also available with handmade painting (by Ruth's sister Dana) instead of stingray. These items are unisex.

name: Stingray Frame Cufflinks, RAN328C
description: Sterling silver button-back style cuff links with genuine stingray leather. Available in 15 different stingray colors, shown with "olive" stingray.

name: Stingray Frame Rings, RAN334R & RAN335R
description: Hand made solid sterling stingray frame rings. Available in rectangular or square "cube" styles with 15 different stingray colors to choose from. These rings are shown with "olive" (left, RAN334, cube) and "black" (right, RAN335, rectangular). Sizes 5 to 12 available in each style. This item is unisex, price for for each ring individually. Special ordering for specific color/size available, please contact Ruth Avra.

name: Stingray Frame Rings, RAN328R
description: Sterling silver frame ring with genuine stingray leather. Shown with "ocean blue" stingray, available in 15 different stingray color options, sizes 5-12. This ring is available in a size 5, frame is 1 x .75 inches.

name: Cuttlefish Series, RAN310
description: Texture pendants - made by the ancient process of cuttlefish casting - are available on leather or ball chain. Each side has a different texture, both are shown. Each necklace comes with 1 cuttlefish charm. Available in darkened and bright silver.

name: Feather Necklace, RAM230
description: Sterling silver handmade chain with carved bone feathers. Available with three different size feathers, smallest shown is 1.5 inches, medium also available 2.25 inches. Chain is 36 inches long and can be worn several ways including as a belt. Clasp detail shown.

name: Feather Series Earrings, RAM230E
description: Sterling silver and carved bone feathers make these simple everyday favorite earrings. Feathers come in several sizes, 1.5 inches is the smallest shown in first product image, medium size on model, largest in second product image.

name: Feather Series Earrings, RAM234E
description: Sterling silver and carved bone feathers make these simple everyday favorite earrings. Feathers come in several sizes, 1.5 inches is the smallest, shown here with small and medium together.

name: Crazy Lace Necklace
description: Sterling silver handmade chain surrounds these matching slices of Crazy Lace Agate. Stones are approximately 3 x 2 inches each. Graduated double chains hang at 32 and 34 inches long.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Chain Necklace with Center Stone
description: These sterling silver necklaces are 36 inches long and showcase an amazing one-of-a-kind stone, signature cutout design on back. Can be worn six different ways including as a necklace! Stone and size options vary, please contact Ruth Avra for availability for placing a custom order.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Two Stone Necklace
description: Two amazing contrasting stones make up this one-of-a-kind necklace. Larger stone is 4.5 inches long, small stone is .75 inch circle. Three graduated chains hang at 26, 28, and 30 inches long. Small stone has signature cutout on back.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Drusy Rock Ring
description: These one-of-a-kind cocktail rings showcase a fabulous center stone with many available options. Signature cutout design always on back. Stone options vary, contact Ruth Avra for stone images to place custom order.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Stingray Belt Buckle, RAN102
description: Using the riveting process to frame exotic skins in metal, this limited edition collection - limited to 10, numbered and signed - gives the ultimate in customization. All belts are made with hand sawed sterling silver with copper backing, stingray leather shown at buckle through cutout, with Italian leather belt straps. All styles come in any color combination of more than 15 stingray and 5 belt colors. Belt shown in first image with Turquoise stingray and Brown belt, 2 x 3.5 inches.  Choose "custom" in the drop down menu to order this style with different stingray & belt colors or size.

name: Custom Initial Series
description: Hand sawed initials made into necklaces and cuff links, this jewelry makes the ultimate wedding gift! Get a set for the bride and groom with their wedding date on the back. Make them your own by requesting a "heart" or "&" between initials! Necklace retail $250, cuff links retail $375, when ordered as a set there is no charge for stamping. To order individually contact Ruth Avra.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Rutile Rings, White Gold
description: These one of a kind rings are made with a stunning rutile quartz and diamond (chocolate, cognac and black) set in 18k gold. Certain rings shown are sold but there are other options available in the same style, please contact Ruth Avra. Ring on model is 18k rose gold with rutile quartz and cognac diamond and is currently available for $2995, ring pictured with starfish is 18k white gold with rutile quartz and black diamond is SOLD. Please contact Ruth Avra for additional stone options.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Rutile Rings, Rose Gold
description: These one of a kind rings are made with a stunning rutile quartz and diamond (chocolate, cognac and black) set in 18k gold. Certain rings shown are sold but there are other options available in the same style, please contact Ruth Avra. Ring on model is 18k rose gold with rutile quartz and cognac diamond and is currently available for $2995, ring pictured with starfish is 18k white gold with rutile quartz and black diamond for $2515.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Butterfly Clutch
description: Sterling silver hydraulic-formed clutch style handbag (with optional handle in back) with amazing cascade of feathers as well as stingray leather shown through the cutout butterfly and 18k gold details. Opens with interior similar to an ID case; holds money, credit cards, etc. 5 inches wide and over 18 inches long with feathers, this showstopper is sure to get noticed! Please contact Ruth Avra for purchase.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Peacock Purse
description: This one of a kind statement handbag is hand made with sterling silver, copper, and peacock feathers. Hinged at bottom, opens like an ID case and can hold everything from business cards to credit cards and cash.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Petal Purse
description: The one of a kind clutch-style ID case handbag is made of brass and sterling silver. Can hold business cards to credit cards and cash. Petite and unique sure to make a statement.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Raw Diamond Ring
description: This one of a kind diamond ring boasts a raw diamond of 4.23 carats (Canada in origin) along with three re-purposed vintage faceted diamonds totaling .5 carats set in 18k natural textured white gold. Size is a 5, but can be altered upon request. THIS RING IS SOLD, but please contact Ruth Avra to inquire about a commission.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Two Stone Necklace with Gold
description: Two small stones sit opposite a handmade chain with interlacing 14k gold diamond cut ball chain, sterling silver handmade chain goes around the neck with a signature Ruth Avra clasp. Necklace is 23 inches long with agate at 1.25 inches and dendrite stone at .75 x .5 inches. One of a kind.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Antler Necklace
description: This amazing piece of reclaimed antler is set in blackened sterling silver with 18k gold and one of a kind cut out design on back. Necklace is approximately 18 inches long, adjustable, antler piece is 3 x 2.25 inches.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Broken Heart Necklace
description: Split ocean jasper set in sterling silver with 14k gold chains between the two parts. Handmade chain makes up this approximately 18 inch long necklace. A truly one-of-a-kind piece with Ruth Avra Signature cutout design on back.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Diamond Slice Ring
description: 18k gold sets these amazing diamond slices stacked, totaling 2.32 carats. The ring is approximately .5 x 1.5 inches, size 6. One of a kind and spectacular!

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Sterling Buckle with painting, "concrete"
description: These one of a kind buckles were the very beginning of the collaboration between Ruth and her sister Dana! Dana's paintings are the backdrop for Ruth's striking designs on these gorgeous buckles. Although very popular, these buckles proved to be too time consuming to market and these are the last of available stock! Get them for a wonderful price, limited time only! Buckle in picture is 2 x 3.5 inches, shown with black belt. Belt is detachable, each buckle comes with 1, please choose size/color in drop down menu before adding to cart.

categories.name: ONE OF A KIND - RUTH AVRA

name: Sterling Buckle with painting, "magenta"
description: These one of a kind buckles were the very beginning of the collaboration between Ruth and her sister Dana! Dana's paintings are the backdrop for Ruth's striking designs on these gorgeous buckles. Although very popular, these buckles proved to be too time consuming to market and these are the last of available stock! Get them for a wonderful price, limited time only! Buckle in picture is 2 x 3.5 inches, shown with brown belt. Belt is detachable, each buckle comes with 1, please choose size/color in drop down menu before adding to cart.
